name: final-minimal-fullstack-koa-react-ssr
description: Minimal Koa + React SSR (Vite client bundle) with pnpm

scripts.build: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:ssr
scripts.dev: kill-port 3000 || true && concurrently -k -n client,ssr,server -c cyan,magenta,green "vite build -c client/vite.config.mjs -w" "vite build -c server/vite.ssr.config.mjs -w" "nodemon --watch server --ext js,jsx,json server/index.js"
